page.title: 04A Day In The Life of M.Tarry
page.content: Beep! my watch alarm wakes me up at 7.15a.m. on a sunny day in East Sussex in the summer of 1985. I groan and open my eyes. Mum comes in and gives me a cup of tea to attempt to wake me up. I put on my clothes, which on school days is school uniform consisting of a white shirt and black trousers and white socks and my tie which is red and blue stripes which I only wear in winter and on school visits. I walk to the mirror and brush my hair. I have got blond hair which is quite short and greyish blue eyes. I go down to breakfast and lay the table. For breakfast I eat Weetabix or Cornflakes with milk and sugar and a cup of tea to wash it down with. I have an 8 year old sister called Alexandra or Alex for short.
